comment:
/** * Return the PropertyChangeEvent that resulted in the problem. *

May be {@code null}. only available if an actual bean property * was affected. */
code:
/** * Return the PropertyChangeEvent that resulted in the problem. *

May be {@code null}. only available if an actual bean property * was affected. */ @Nullable public PropertyChangeEvent getPropertyChangeEvent() { return this.propertyChangeEvent. }

comment: /**  * Return the name of the affected property, if available.  */
code: /**  * Return the name of the affected property, if available.  */ @Nullable public String getPropertyName() {     return (this.propertyChangeEvent != null ? this.propertyChangeEvent.getPropertyName() : null). }

comment: /**  * Return the affected value that was about to be set, if any.  */
code: /**  * Return the affected value that was about to be set, if any.  */ @Nullable public Object getValue() {     return (this.propertyChangeEvent != null ? this.propertyChangeEvent.getNewValue() : null). }

comment: /**  * Return a corresponding error code for this type of exception.  */
code: /**  * Return a corresponding error code for this type of exception.  */ public abstract String getErrorCode().
